---
title: "Artwork"
---

It surprises me that making art with birdsong spectrograms isn't more common. They're so distinctive and pretty.

These pieces were made in Procreate on iPad. Spectrograms are not to scale; I've used them as stamps to create larger art pieces.

!["Go nuts" (Clark's nutcracker; red-breasted nuthatch)](images/GN2.jpg){width=80%}

!["Black and white" (black-and-white warbler)](images/BW2.jpg){width=80%}

!["Resonance" (downy woodpecker; northern flicker; hairy woodpecker)](images/R2.jpg){width=80%}

!["When you pish" (mountain chickadee)](images/WYP2.jpg){width=80%}
